publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1029 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the order in which the amendments to the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill be disposed of at Stage 3 of the Bill be altered so that the amendments to each schedule are considered immediately after the amendments to the section which introduces it. Supported by: Iain Smith*
